```
00000000
00111000
01111100
01111110
01111110
01111110
00111100
00011000
```

This is an example of a grid of pixels that form an image of a letter A:

```
00111100
01100110
11000011
11000011
11111111
11000011
11000011
11000011
```

This is an example of a grid of pixels that form an image of a smiley face:

```
00000000
01100110
01100110
00000000
10000001
10000001
01111110
00000000
```
